text: geudeul-ege buyeodoen amuleon neunglyeogdo eobs-i hananim-ui malsseum-e gwanhayeo nonjaenghaneun jadeul-ui simjung-eneun o jig oman ppun-ini geudeul-i balaneun geos-e gyeolko dodalhal su eobsneun geos-ila geuleomeulo hananim an-eseo guhala modeun geos-eul deul-eusigo jikyeobosineun bun-eun hananim ppun-ila
